channel.title: How is Kicksecure working with Openstack?
channel.description: Is there anyone using or tried to use Kicksecure to run Openstack? How is Kicksecure working with Openstack components? Are they working fine? Please share your experience with it! I was looking for a security oriented Debian-based distro as my Linux server to host Openstack undercloud, overcloud and guest VM as servers for our service. I just want to know your experience on working with it as a server. Thanks!

item.title: How is Kicksecure working with Openstack?
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Is there anyone using or tried to use Kicksecure to run Openstack? How is Kicksecure working with Openstack components? Are they working fine? Please share your experience with it!
I was looking for a security oriented Debian-based distro as my Linux server to host Openstack undercloud, overcloud and guest VM as servers for our service. I just want to know your experience on working with it as a server.
Thanks!
